results.contributor: by Grant Morrison and Chris Burnham
results.title: BATMAN INCORPORATED, VOL. 2
results.author: Grant Morrison and Chris Burnham
results.description: Talia al Ghul leads Leviathan on a final strike to destroy Gotham and Damian makes the ultimate sacrifice to save the city.

results.contributor: by Chuck Dixon and others
results.title: BATMAN VERSUS BANE
results.author: Chuck Dixon and others
results.description: Bane, the villain who broke Batman’s back, is back to plunder Gotham City. How will this round go for the Dark Knight?

results.contributor: by Jeff Parker and Richard Case
results.title: BATMAN ’66, VOL. 1
results.author: Jeff Parker and Richard Case
results.description: “Holy licensing, Batman!” All of the iconic hallmarks and camp sensibilities of the 1960s “Batman” television program are transported to the printed page in this series.

results.contributor: by Scott Snyder
results.title: BATMAN, THE BLACK MIRROR
results.author: Scott Snyder
results.description: It is a bad week to be in Gotham City: Batman (Dick Grayson) confronts a new evil and Commissioner Gordon must cope with his psychopathic son.

results.contributor: by Scott Snyder and Greg Capullo
results.title: BATMAN, VOL. 1
results.author: Scott Snyder and Greg Capullo
results.description: The caped crusader faces a new conspiracy of evil that goes back to his roots and the earliest days of Gotham City.

results.contributor: by Scott Snyder, Greg Capullo and James Tynion IV
results.title: BATMAN, VOL. 10
results.author: Scott Snyder, Greg Capullo and James Tynion IV
results.description: This collection explores the Dark Knight’s past, present and possible future.

results.contributor: by Scott Snyder and Greg Capullo
results.title: BATMAN, VOL. 2
results.author: Scott Snyder and Greg Capullo
results.description: The caped crusader continues to fight a conspiracy of evil that is rooted in the earliest days of Gotham City.

results.contributor: by Scott Snyder and Greg Capullo
results.title: BATMAN, VOL. 3
results.author: Scott Snyder and Greg Capullo
results.description: The Joker’s back and after having his face sliced off, he is more dangerous and deranged than ever before.

results.description: The Joker’s back and after having his face sliced off, he is more dangerous and deranged than ever before.

results.contributor: by Scott Snyder and Greg Capullo
results.title: BATMAN, VOL. 4
results.author: Scott Snyder and Greg Capullo
results.description: Batman’s origin is reimagined here and the first threat he must face is the Red Hood and his anonymous gang.

results.contributor: by Scott Snyder and Greg Capullo

results.description: Batman’s origin is reimagined here and the first threat he must face is the Red Hood and his anonymous gang.

results.contributor: by Scott Snyder and Greg Capullo
results.title: BATMAN, VOL. 5
results.author: Scott Snyder and Greg Capullo
results.description: The reimagined origin of Batman continues as the Riddler takes control of Gotham City by cutting it off from the outside world.

results.contributor: by Scott Snyder and Greg Capullo

results.description: The reimagined origin of Batman continues as the Riddler takes control of Gotham City by cutting it off from the outside world.

results.contributor: by Scott Snyder, Greg Capullo and others
results.title: BATMAN, VOL. 6
results.author: Scott Snyder, Greg Capullo and others
results.description: Batman battles his own demons, along with the Red Hood, Clayface and Catwoman in this collection of stories.

results.title: BATMAN, VOL. 7
results.author: Scott Snyder and Greg Capullo
results.description: The citizens of Gotham and even the Justice League fall under the sway of a new toxin created by the Joker.

results.title: BATMAN, VOL. 8
results.author: Scott Snyder and Greg Capullo
results.description: There’s a new Batman in town, and this one is officially sanctioned by the Gotham City Police Department.

results.contributor: by Scott Snyder and Greg Capullo
results.title: BATMAN, VOL. 9
results.author: Scott Snyder and Greg Capullo
results.description: Bruce Wayne reclaims the cape and cowl in order to stop Mr. Bloom from destroying Gotham City.
